{RHelp Topic{W: Caerdik{x

Caerdik is the God of Orde. He is a firm believer in enforcing law and
order, almost to a fault. He can be quite thick headed and stubborn, and is
quick to anger. He is though, usually quite fair and just, even if he is a
bit emotional. He respects Aludra and Nephium, but is somewhat wary of
Selucia because of her unpredictability. His mortal enemy is Sirian, and he
detests Myst who seems to flirt with him just because she knows it upsets
him. He also does not get along with Malyki, though he doesn't seem to know
why. Most likely because they are two sides of the same coin. Caerdik's
followers are usually those who enforce the law or at least believe in it.
Their spells usually consist of righteous attack and protective spells. They
are usually very handy in a fight.
